title: Karaoke Abattoir
description:
from the myspace profile (natureboylasvegas):

Nature Boy! is no more, but for a few brief mindblowing years they produced some fine improvisational art-rock noise. Based in Las Vegas from 1994 through 1998 they played in and subsequently were banned from a number of local venues. While still active they released one recording, Karaoke Abattoir, which stands as their defining document. Karaoke Abattoir gives 72 minutes of insight into the nature of Nature Boy, but only hints at the insanity of their live shows, which have been described as 'hilarious' and 'orgasmic.' Nature Boy! was notorious for their conspicuous consumption of drugs and alcohol, often performing live under the influence of mushrooms or LSD. This profile is dedicated to the memory of Nature Boy! The Dangerous Insect Audio label plans to re-release on CD the previously cassette-only Karaoke Abattoir, as well as a new posthumous release New Death Experience. There is also a large trove of unreleased material waiting to be mined for future release.
